name: powwow
0:
”Alexa, turn on Lamp”
”Alexa, set Lamp to 50 percent”
”Alexa, dim Lamp by 10 percent”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
With this skill and Alexa, you can control your outlet or light, and change its color by using the following Alexa skill commands as example: 

"Alexa, turn on Lamp"
"Alexa, set Lamp to 50 percent"
"Alexa, dim Lamp by 10 percent"
"Alexa, brighten Lamp by 90 percent"

powwow Smart Device is required.

Download powwow app on Android Play Store or iOS App Store for more instruction on how to setup and use Alexa voice commands to control powwow Smart Devices.
